reviewText: There are NO instructions of any kind with this DVD and I can't make sense of the "menu"? I can't figure out what the options are or anything. Very frustrating!!! I wish I hadn't wasted the money.
very nice - first I thought this is a joke .... but now I think this is just great.

could be not more simple - but this is what good design is about. If you are in the field of architecture, interior design or similar - this is a real find. Excellent piece of .... what? design? art? simplicity? Love it!
